attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel compelled to comment upon the quality of the commentary of the rugby world cup.  
I found it unprofessional and bias, particulary the oratory of the english presenters. Their excitement at the prospect of english superiority beggars belief. It is with regret that the aforementioned becomes a topic of complaint. Perhaps i may respectfully suggest that the government put in place legislation to remind broadcasters that we are a nation of four countries, not just one and should remain impartial with their commentry.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
